title: Anyone else experiencing weird disconnects in Champion Loading Screen?
body:
After today's maintenance, a couple of the games (around 50%) kept causing my League client to crash in champion loading screen. It's happened twice already, and other times it's extremely slow loading where everyone would connect and join a minute or so later. I use an iMac (pls senpai don't hate) and this never usually happens.

Although i'm not fussed, it has resulted in me getting a lower priority queue. 

Has anyone had similar experiences and/or know of any solutions to get around this? I was playing fine up until after today's maintenance. 

Cheers, GL on the Rift.

-Sud

replies.body: I've had the same problem. However I'm on Windows so I don't believe it is OS specific. The only way I've been able to minimize the notice of it happening to me is to not change screens or do anything after champ select. Hopefully it works for you and they get it fixed soon.
